title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3059/91 of 18 October 1991 laying down definitive measures on the issuing of STM licences for beef and veal in trade with Portugal
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 3059/91  of 18 October 1991  laying down definitive measures on the issuing of STM licences for beef and veal in trade with Portugal
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities. This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 18 October 1991. For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
